solution_line_template: Tony drank yesterday {total_percent}% - {yesterday_less_percent}% = {yesterday_percentage}% of what he drank two days ago.
Since {yesterday_percentage}% is {yesterday_ounces} ounces, then every {one_percent_value}% is equal to {yesterday_ounces}/{yesterday_percentage} = {ounces_per_percent} ounces of water.
So, Tony drank {ounces_per_percent} x {total_percent_drank_two_days_ago} = <<{ounces_per_percent}*{total_percent_drank_two_days_ago}={two_days_ago_ounces}>>{two_days_ago_ounces} ounces two days ago.
